summary: Complete verification of XoW Dashboard features: video overlay, visitor labels with Play buttons, Jump to Segment sidebar, and Sessions tab AI summary. All 12 backend tests passed, all UI tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: Video overlay function (add_video_overlay) correctly configured with DATE, TIME, TIMECODE, FRAME counter, XoW logo
FFmpeg overlay uses libx264 codec with proper font paths for text rendering
Visitors tab shows conversation labels with Play buttons and Start Time display - WORKING
Play button on visitor label opens video modal at correct timestamp (playMedia called with start_time)
Video modal has 'Jump to Segment' sidebar with Speakers and Conversations sections - WORKING
Sessions tab shows AI summary without detailed speaker breakdown - WORKING

test_credentials.note: No special credentials needed - public dashboard UI

seed_data_creation: Used existing test recording '699532747ab286ee3527dbd2' (XoW Demo Booth)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Video overlay function applies DATE/TIME/TIMECODE/FRAME/XoW logo to uploaded videos using FFmpeg. 2) Visitors tab shows 4 conversation labels with Start Time display and Play buttons. 3) Clicking Play button opens video modal with 'Jump to Segment' sidebar showing Speakers (Host, Visitor) and Conversations. 4) Sessions tab shows AI Insights with overall summary, topics, and key insights without detailed speaker dialogue breakdown. 5) Video modal correctly receives start_time parameter (playMedia called with time=0.8695699499999999). Test recording '699532747ab286ee3527dbd2' used for verification.

video_overlay_function.details: add_video_overlay() function configured with mobile app style: DATE, TIME, TIMECODE (running), FRAME counter, REC indicator, XoW logo (purple background)
video_overlay_function.ffmpeg_config: Uses libx264 codec, DejaVu fonts, proper color codes (0x9CA3AF for labels, 0xEF4444 for red, 0x8B5CF6 for purple)

visitors_tab_conversation_labels.details: 4 visitor labels displayed with visitor name, booth name, date, sentiment badge, summary, topics, questions asked
visitors_tab_conversation_labels.play_button: 1 Play button found (for recordings with video), opens modal with correct timestamp

play_button_video_seeking.details: playMedia() function receives recording_id, booth_name, and start_time parameters
play_button_video_seeking.console_log: playMedia called: id=699532747ab286ee3527dbd2, title=XoW Demo Booth, time=0.8695699499999999

jump_to_segment_sidebar.details: Sidebar shows 'SPEAKERS' section (Host 0:00, Visitor 0:00) and 'CONVERSATIONS' section (Introduction to AI recording features)
jump_to_segment_sidebar.sidebar_interaction: Clicking speaker/conversation segments calls seekTo() function

sessions_tab_ai_summary.details: Sessions show 'AI Insights' with 'Host Identified' badge, overall summary text, key topics, key insights
sessions_tab_ai_summary.no_speaker_breakdown: Session cards do NOT show detailed speaker-by-speaker dialogue breakdown

ui_test_results.visitors_tab_navigation: PASS - Clicked nav-visitors, found 4 visitor labels
ui_test_results.play_button_modal: PASS - Modal opened with video player and sidebar
ui_test_results.sessions_tab_navigation: PASS - Found 27 session cards, 6 AI Insights sections, 3 Host Identified badges
